plugins.description: Universal multi-domain agent system for Claude Code with 231 specialized agents across 11 domains. V6.2.1 features Massive Parallel Execution: execute up to 50 concurrent agents with intelligent queue management, dynamic load balancing, work stealing, and real-time monitoring. V2 Universal Workflow Architecture with 5 universal workflow agents working across all domains via YAML configuration. 8 core infrastructure agents + 223 domain experts. Features: recursive workflows, configuration-driven behavior, subagent coordination protocol, performance tracking system, 4 execution modes (Sequential, Pipeline, Swarm, Mesh). Complete domains: software (45 agents), business (18), creative (18), planning (17), sales (18), marketing (22), finance (17), operations (15), hr (19), legal (14), support (18). Intelligence Layer, QA Layer, Executive Leadership. Universal /trigger, /designer, /reviewer, /optimize commands.
